name: Gaia Crusaders
description:
Gaia Crusaders is a 2D side-scrolling beat 'em-up game that puts players in the shoes of one of five heroes. In 20xx Satan has conquered Earth and the end is near. Only the Tear of Gaia can reverse this fate. However it was broken into seven pieces and you have to collect these pieces. You can play as Kohen with here fire magic, Koufu and Jimi Isaak with their wind magic or M-985 and Fred Sathal with both wind and fire magic.

You have to fight your way through the demon hordes and bosses and along the way collect the pieces of the tear. Two new character can be unlocked when playing: Rob and Seiyen both using water magic. Magic balls drop occasionally and when picked up let you use magical attacks witch are more powerful if the ball matches your magic attribute. You can play solo or with a friend.
